job.title: ONSITE Web Developer - Front End Web Development, HTML5, CSS3
job.description: If you are a Web Developer with 2 years of experience please read onltbrgtltbrgtWe have been around for over 20 years and have gained 3 billion in assets since 2019 We are looking to add team members who are willing to work onsite essential businessltbrgtltbrgtCurrently we are looking for a Web Developer who is selfmotivated and accountable that can also work in a collaborative environment We offer competitive salaries bonuses based on individual performance PTO and federal holidays to keep you happy  we ENCOURAGE you to take all PTO to keep refreshed and sharp at work We work hard and play hardltbrgtltbrgtWhat You Will Be Doingltbrgtltulgtltligt Maintain our current websites landing pages and related web propertiesltligtltligt Construction of new websitesltligtltligt Frontend design and developmentltligtltligt Implement website personalization and AB testingltligtltligt Work with custom implementationsconnections with external web applicationsltligtltligt Website Tag Managementltligtltligt Identify issuesbugs and troubleshoot accordinglyltligtltligt Collaborate with and mentor other web developersltbrgtltligtltulgtWhat You Need for this Positionltbrgtltulgtltligt 2 years frontend web developmentltligtltligt HTML5 CSS3 Utilize organized and semantic code structure with emphasis on current standards and best responsive practicesltligtltligt JavaScript working knowledge of Vanilla JS jQuery and JS frameworks such as Angular React or Vueltligtltligt CMS Knowledge of how to develop custom code for Content Management Systemsltligtltligt ADA Knowledge of and experience developing to the WCAG 20 AA levelltligtltligt Exceptional organization with attention to the details while meeting your deadlinesltligtltligt Creation and maintenance of documentationltligtltligt Familiarity of connecting with CRM systemsltligtltligt Excellent communication skills and the ability to work independently and collaborate with Packageltligtltligt Dental Medical and Visionltligtltligt 401Kltligtltligt Bonuses SemiAnnually Based Off Individual Performanceltligtltligt Self Managing  No Micromanagementltligtltligt Paid Parkingltligtltligt PTO 3 Weeks First Yearltligtltligt 8 Sick Daysltligtltligt Bank Holidays 910ltbrgtltligtltulgtSo if you are a Web Developer with experience please apply todayltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtEmail Your Resume In Word ToltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply
